mapper.insert: insert into member(no, id, name, nick, pw, salt, loop) values(member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{pw}, #{salt}, #{loop})
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, salt=#{salt}, loop=#{loop} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select salt from member where id=#{id}
